entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
